TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InfrastructureResolver extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An infrastructure resolver attempts to resolve the values of any unset properties or resources in . This can be useful for defaulting common values, implementing organization policies, or other scenarios where you want to uniformly configure all the resources in a deployment.
